mapper.sql: t_weixin_task_apply.id as weixinTaskApplyId, t_weixin_task_apply.task_id as weixinTaskApplyTaskId, t_weixin_task_apply.user_id as weixinTaskApplyUserId, t_weixin_task_apply.pub_confirm_status as weixinTaskApplyPubConfirmStatus, t_weixin_task_apply.pub_confirm_time as weixinTaskApplyPubConfirmTime, t_weixin_task_apply.app_confirm_status as weixinTaskApplyAppConfirmStatus, t_weixin_task_apply.app_confirm_time as weixinTaskApplyAppConfirmTime, t_weixin_task_apply.create_time as weixinTaskApplyCreateTime, t_weixin_task_apply.update_time as weixinTaskApplyUpdateTime, t_weixin_task_apply.version as weixinTaskApplyVersion, t_weixin_task_apply.is_active as weixinTaskApplyIsActive, t_user.phone as userPhone, t_user_detail.nickname as userDetailNickname, t_user_detail.headicon as userDetailHeadicon
mapper.select:
select
from t_weixin_task_apply, t_user, t_user_detail where t_weixin_task_apply.id = #{id} and t_weixin_task_apply.user_id = t_user.id and t_user.id = t_user_detail.id

select
from t_weixin_task_apply, t_user, t_user_detail where t_weixin_task_apply.user_id = t_user.id and t_user.id = t_user_detail.id order by t_weixin_task_apply.update_time desc, t_weixin_task_apply.create_time desc

select
from t_weixin_task_apply, t_user, t_user_detail
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_weixin_task_apply.update_time desc, t_weixin_task_apply.create_time desc
select count(*) from t_weixin_task_apply, t_user, t_user_detail
